taDuoc: Calcium hydrogen phosphat, Tinh bột ngô, Cellulose vi tinh thể, Hypromellose K4M, Povidone K-90 (Kollidone), Bột Talc tinh khiết, Colloidal anhydrous silica, Sodium starch glycolate (Type - A) (PH 5,5-7,5), Methacrylic acid copolymer (Type - C) (Eudragit L 100-55), Methacrylic acid copolymer (Type - B) (Eudragit S 100), Dibutyl phthalat, Titanium dioxide (Anatase), Màu oxít sắt, Macrogol (6000) (Plakes form)
